Text: Aye, and Gomorrah, and other stories:  The book is closely based on an earlier collection, "Driftglass", which first appeared in 1971.

Text: Aye, and Gomorrah, and other stories:  The dedication to the two books is similar: one is simply an updated version of the other, dedicating the book to Delany’s immediate family: his maternal grandmother, mother, sister, and father.

Text: Aye, and Gomorrah, and other stories:  The ten tales contained in "Driftglass" are all contained in "Aye, and Gomorrah", along with five other stories ("Omegahelm", "Among the Blobs", "Tapestry", "Prismatica", "Ruins").
